segments.text: Hey , Frank . I heard you got a new job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , Judy . I will be working for the Post Office . It ’ s not a bad job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it true that you have a heavy work schedule ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s right . I report to work at 5am everyday , and I only get 45 minutes for lunch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , why did you apply for such a demanding job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the government offers its employees excellent health insurance benefits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . And can your family utilize 5 the health insurance , too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , that ’ s the best part . All of my children can get free medical care .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s a great employment benefit !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now you know why I wanted to work for the Post Office !
segments.speaker: S2
